information.overview: Barcelona is a city in Spain.
information.details: It is the capital of Catalonia and the second largest city in Spain.

information.overview: India is a country in South Asia. It is the seventh-largest country by area.
information.details: Tajmahal is a historical and administrative center in India. It is located in the city of Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India.
information.reviews: My experience was amazing! I was able to see the Taj Mahal from the top of the hill!

information.overview: Paris possesses a rich and attractive cultural scene with shows, activities and festivals.
information.details: Paris is the capital of France and one of the most populous cities in Europe.
information.reviews: Paris is a great city to visit.
